  • Method Details

    • endOfDelay

      public abstract long endOfDelay​(long time, Person person)

    • processOnce

      public void processOnce​(Person person, long time)
      Process any aspect of this state which should only happen once. Because of the nature of Delay states, this state may get called multiple times: once per timestep while delaying. To ensure any actions which are supposed to happen only happen once, this function should be overriden in subclasses.
      Parameters:
      person - the person being simulated
      time - the date within the simulated world

    • process

      public boolean process​(Person person, long time)
      Description copied from class: State
      Process this State with the given Person at the specified time within the simulation. If this State generates a HealthRecord.Entry during processing, then the resulting data will reside in the State.entry field.
      Specified by:
      process in class State
      Parameters:
      person - : the person being simulated
      time - : the date within the simulated world
      Returns:
      `true` if processing should continue to the next state, `false` if the processing should halt for this time step.
